# WEAPON::SET_PED_WEAPON_COMPONENT_TINT_INDEX

## Summary
Set a ped's tint index for the specified weapon component attached to the specified weapon

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** pedIndex
* **WEAPON_TYPE** weaponType
* **WEAPONCOMPONENT_TYPE** componentType
* **INT** tintIndex

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Colors:
0 = Gray
1 = Dark Gray
2 = Black
3 = White
4 = Blue
5 = Cyan
6 = Aqua
7 = Cool Blue
8 = Dark Blue
9 = Royal Blue
10 = Plum
11 = Dark Purple
12 = Purple
13 = Red
14 = Wine Red
15 = Magenta
16 = Pink
17 = Salmon
18 = Hot Pink
19 = Rust Orange
20 = Brown
21 = Earth
22 = Orange
23 = Light Orange
24 = Dark Yellow
25 = Yellow
26 = Light Brown
27 = Lime Green
28 = Olive
29 = Moss
30 = Turquoise
31 = Dark Green
Full list of weapons, components, tint indexes & weapon liveries by DurtyFree: https://github.com/DurtyFree/gta-v-data-dumps/blob/master/weapons.json
